title: black screen in champion select to long
body:
i press play, i wait for every one to press accept. screen stays black then says i failed to select a champion now i have to wait 6 minutes.
happens every time i start my first game opening launcher. already repaird game once. also i get this error every time i turn on the game and after the game. but its not game breaking.

replies.body: You might be having a connection issue that's failing to transfer you over to the same lobby with everyone else in your queue, so you end up getting left behind.  The black screen further affirms this if you do get through champion select because it can't download any assets.  You'll want to troubleshoot your network by going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
